channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Country House Auction
channel.desc: A five-diamond platinum sparkler, Italian marble chimney piece and Tibetan dagger go under the hammer. Will a guitar signed by The Rolling Stones give someone satisfaction.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Country House Auction
channel.desc: A 19th-century Japanese silver punchbowl, a boule table and a John Constable painting go under the hammer. And will a 1930s Philco radio make a sound profit.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Highclere
channel.desc: The castle transforms into a magical winter wonderland, as the team wrestle their biggest-ever tree and butler Louis gets very merry hosting a cocktail making master class. Last in series.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Stick Up
channel.desc: In this period caper, set in 1930s England, romance blooms between two very different people, an American thief and an Irish woman.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Commandos
channel.desc: Action. World War II. Allied commandos are parachuted into North Africa on a mission to infiltrate and hold an Axis-held fort until reinforcements arrive. Lee Van Cleef stars.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Magnificent Seven Deadly Sins
channel.desc: Bawdy seventies sketch comedy film starring a bevy of British talent from Bruce Forsyth and Harry Secombe to Joan Simms and June Whitfield. Contains 70s social attitudes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The World Is Full of Married Men
channel.desc: David Cooper works in advertising but spends more time on his extra-marital love life. When his wife discovers his affairs, she decides to get her revenge. Contains nudity.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Let's Get Laid
channel.desc: Gordon Laid is a soldier returning to London after WW2. He gets mixed up in a series of murders and mistaken identities. Bawdy romp with Robin Askwith. Contains nudity and 70s social attitudes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Mary Millington
channel.desc: from the David Galaxy Affair. A playboy astrologer has to prove his alibi for a years-old robbery. With Mary Millington, Rosemary England and Diana Dors. Contains sexual scenes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Weekend Millionaires
channel.desc: An oral history of Britain's most famous river; focusing on the Lightermen and Watermen who have worked on the Thames from the 1960s to today.

channel.desc: Your one-stop-shop for all things cruise; bringing you the hottest destinations, ground-breaking ships and the latest deals! Call 0800 090 3393 or visit us at www.loveitbookit.com/tv.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Debra from Wigan wants her plot to be transformed into a calming zen garden for relaxation and contemplation. For ?6,000, can Charlie and Lee bring her vision to life.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Love Your Garden
channel.desc: Alan Titchmarsh is tackling the most difficult plot the team have ever faced. Chris lost his hands and feet to sepsis and is moved to tears by the fabulous family garden.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Greatest Auction
channel.desc: How much will the collectors and dealers bid for a Banksy artwork, pickled pig foetuses and Tommy Cooper's fez.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Signs for Change
channel.desc: Rose Ayling-Ellis takes us on a personal journey into the deaf experience and asks whether attitudes are finally changing.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Country Show Cook Off
channel.desc: In Cumbria, chefs Aldo Zilli and Silvena Rowe create sausage rolls for the Brough Annual Agricultural Show, where nothing but perfection will do.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Greatest Auction
channel.desc: A 1940s fairground attraction, Saddam Hussein's fork and a pinball machine signed by Elton John come to the auction house.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Scotland's Greatest Escape
channel.desc: A secluded retreat, a private cruise and a visit to a castle compete in the Luxury category.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Edwardian Farm
channel.desc: Two archaeologists and a historian try Edwardian life for a year. They prepare for the arrival of their first livestock, and historian Ruth Goodman cooks a sheep's head stew.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: LumoTV
channel.desc: Five daunting games, but only one winning team. Will it be the close friends Steve and Joe, Moona and Stephen, or Amy and her father Rodney taking home ?1,000.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Queer Lives Today
channel.desc: Shiva Raichandani's film follows Asifa as she prepares to undergo gender affirmation surgery. The trans activist reflects on how her life has changed during her transition.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Love Your Garden
channel.desc: Alan Titchmarsh is tackling the most difficult plot the team have ever faced. Chris lost his hands and feet to sepsis and is moved to tears by the fabulous family garden.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: My Floating Home
channel.desc: After 25 years living in New Zealand, Keith and Pam dream of touring the UK's waterways. But it's their first boat and they'll need to learn the ropes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: LumoTV
channel.desc: Five daunting games, but only one winning team. Will it be the close friends Steve and Joe, Moona and Stephen, or Amy and her father Rodney taking home ?1,000.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Bread
channel.desc: Seventies drama. Returning home from the Isle of Wight Pop Festival, a free-spirited group of guys and girls clash with the landowner where they pitch camp. Contains nudity.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: This, That and the Other
channel.desc: Saucy and trippy British comedy about three men caught up in compromising situations during their normal daily lives. Starring Dennis Waterman and Vanda Hudson. Contains nudity.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Real Thick Glasses
channel.desc: Solomon Watkins' quirky take as he interviews Michael, owner of the world's most unique collection of Really Thick Glasses. Funded and supported by Together TV and Cat Flap Media.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Girl on a Motorcycle
channel.desc: This sixties cult classic sees a married woman leaving her husband, riding off on her prized motorbike to visit her lover. The late, great Marianne Faithful stars. Contains nudity.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Battersea Junction
channel.desc: A history of the Winstanley and York Road estates in Battersea, South London, from the slum clearances that created them to recent developments. Told by local people who have seen the area change.

channel.desc: Charlie and Lee are in Bolton to create a south east Asian-inspired, wildlife-friendly garden for Debbie with a relaxing space for yoga.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Our Land
channel.desc: Our Land is the story of two black food growers who refuse to be held back by barriers of race, class, or land injustice. A film supported and funded by Together TV.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Country Show Cook Off
channel.desc: Aldo Zilli and Silvena Rowe end their road trip in Muker, where they compete to create a winning dish with two items from a Yorkshire Dales kitchen. Last in series.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Greatest Auction
channel.desc: a print by street artist Invader and the coolest skateboard going, designed by the late Virgil Abloh.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Scotland's Greatest Escape
channel.desc: A fun-loving family of four judge treehouses at Lanrick, a secluded, hand-crafted cabin near Loch Lomond and a campsite on a remote Hebridean island.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Edwardian Farm
channel.desc: Archaeologists Alex and Peter and historian Ruth try Edwardian life for a year. The team branch out into market gardening, all-year-round egg production and beef cattle.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Charlie and Lee are in Bolton to create a south east Asian-inspired, wildlife-friendly garden for Debbie with a relaxing space for yoga.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Love Your Garden
channel.desc: Alan Titchmarsh heads to Birmingham to surprise the founder of Britain's first cancer drop-in centre - with a stunning Ibizan-style hideaway garden. Last in series.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: My Floating Home
channel.desc: A German couple want to live closer to nature. They build a novel high-tech caravan that floats on water. But will their radical design work.
